alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:44PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham and southeastern Greenlee Counties through 430 PM MST... At 344 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Clifton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifton, Morenci, Duncan, York, Franklin, Three Way and Guthrie. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 356 and 385. Route 75 between mile markers 379 and 398. Route 78 between mile markers 155 and 161. Route 191 between mile markers 140 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
